# Reflecting (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
This shield seems like a highly polished mirror. Its surface is completely ref lective. Once per day, it can be called on to ref lect a spell back at its caster exactly like the *[[Spell Turning (Spell)|spell turning]]* spell*.*

Strong abjuration*;* CL 14th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Spell Turning (Spell)|spell turning]]**;* Price +5 bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
